grantActivities.point: PI: Haiping Xu, 2017 Creative Economy Initiatives Fund, "Popularity of Cultural Products in Online Social Media," Collaborative Research with University of Massachusetts Boston (PIs: Jurui Zhang and Raymond Liu), July 2017 - June 2018.

PI: Haiping Xu, NSF Grant, "CT-ISG: Agent-Based Trust Management for Trust Re-Evaluation in Online Auctions," Collaborative Research with University of Illinois at Chicago, August 2007 – July 2010 (Project Home Page).
PI: Haiping Xu, Co-PI: Ramprasad Balasubramanian, Marine Corps Grant, "Ontology-Based Dynamic Service Discovery for Fault-Tolerant Service-Oriented Systems," May 2008 – October 2008.
PI: Haiping Xu, Chancellor’s Research/UMass Healey Endowment Grants, "State-Based XML Firewall for Service-Oriented Systems," July 2007 – June 2008 (Project Home Page).
PI: Haiping Xu, Research Seed Initiative Fund (RSIF), "Agent-Based Trustworthy Service-Oriented Architecture," July 2007 – June 2008.
PI: Haiping Xu, Chancellor’s Research/UMass Healey Endowment Grants, "A Trustworthy Agent Based Online Auction System," July 2006 – June 2007.
PI: Haiping Xu, Co-PI: Xiaoqin Zhang, Research Seed Initiative Fund (RSIF), "Prototyping Role-Based Large Scale, Complex Multi-Agent Applications," February 2005 – January 2006 (Project Home Page).
